title: Python Level 1 — Input, Output & Basic Arithmetic
concept: Practice reading input, printing output, and doing basic integer arithmetic in Python.

challenges.title: Sum of Two Integers
challenges.description: Read two integers A and B and print their sum A + B.
challenges.inputDescription: Two integers A and B (on one line or separate lines).
challenges.starterCode:
def main():
    import sys
    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split()
    A = int(data[0])
    B = int(data[1])
    # TODO: print the sum of A and B

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

challenges.title: Sum of Three Integers
challenges.description: Read three integers and print their sum.
challenges.inputDescription: Three integers, separated by spaces or new lines.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum of the three numbers.

challenges.title: Next and Previous
challenges.description: Given an integer N, print two lines. First line: the next integer after N. Second line: the previous integer before N.
challenges.outputDescription: Two lines: N + 1 on the first line, N - 1 on the second line.

challenges.title: Integer Division and Remainder
challenges.description: Given two positive integers A and B, print the quotient A // B and the remainder A % B on one line separated by a space.
challenges.inputDescription: Two positive integers A and B, B ≠ 0.

challenges.title: Last Digit of a Number
challenges.description: Given an integer N, print its last digit (in decimal representation).

challenges.title: School Desks
challenges.description: Three classes have a, b and c students. Each desk seats two students. Find the minimal number of desks needed.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: minimal number of desks.

challenges.title: Minutes to Seconds
challenges.description: Given an integer M representing minutes, convert it to seconds and print the result.

challenges.title: Area of Rectangle
challenges.description: Given width W and height H of a rectangle, print its area W * H.

challenges.title: Greeting by Name
challenges.description: Read a single word name and print a greeting in the format: Hello, <name>!

challenges.title: Sum of First N Natural Numbers
challenges.description: Given an integer N (N ≥ 1), compute the sum 1 + 2 + ... + N and print the result.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: sum from 1 to N.
